src:
BlendFab New Website as the Working tool for CG Artists

04 Nov 2019, 08:35

BlendFab writes:
BlendFab has upgraded the website with a new look and make it a very easy way to use. Every architect, Interior Designer or CG GFX artist will find there usable Assets for the daily works.There are all over more than 50 000 different 3D Assets - 3D Models, PBR Material and Textures directly from manufacturers.Everyone is more than welcome!
